entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationException doesn't have a useful message. #51787
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla #51786
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51785
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51784
  • Perf regression: endpoint #51783
  • Hot Reload with dotnet-watch and Blazor WebAssembly fails with "No hot reload changes to apply." in .NET 7 and "not supported by the runtime" in .NET 8 RC2. #51781
  • [Mock Authentication] Integration tests in ASP.NET Core #51776
  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #51774
    8.0.x
  • We cannot use services registered in Web assembly in components that are Interactive Server rendered. #51773
  • Splitting dotnet.wasm when publishing #51772
  • Quarantine ConnectionClosedWithoutActiveRequestsOrGoAwayFIN #51770
  • Action route starting with `:` is interpreted as `/:` #51769
  • Different scoped services lifetime in Blazor Web App with Server render mode #51768
    Discussions
  • Kestrel options do not apply. #51763
    Discussions
  • Web Farm with IIS10 Servers | Content Server: HTTP Error 500.0 - ASP.NET Core IIS hosting failure (in-process) #51764

Closed

  • Support MAX_CONNECTION_AGE in dotnet server implementation #51778
  • System.Web adapter API to convert between ASP.NET Core and System.Web types #51119
  • source-building: restore.cmd not working properly (Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk not found) #50950
  • Blazor web app template created on dotnet 8.0 using VS2022 Preview has build issues #51738
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50321
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapivanilla #50324
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50323
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50322
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50241
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50240
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50239
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, fortunes_ef #50340
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #50341
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #50342
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #50359
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_dapper, json #50971
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #51383
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates, updates #51457
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, single_query, updates #51486
  • Build time regression for MVC templates #50923
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #51475
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51474
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #51473
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51472
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #51471
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51470
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #51712
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #51684
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishaot #51683
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51682
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51681
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51658
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51657
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #51656
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51655
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishaot #51654
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51653
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51652
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #51716
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #51717
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #51719
  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext, updates #51721
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #51722
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query, updates #51723
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #51729
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #51765
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla #51767
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51766
  • GetEndpoint is always null and RouteValues is always empty in custom exception handler #51755
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, endpoint, mvc #51718

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update SDK version #51761
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Quarantine connection closed test #51771
    tell-mode, area-networking, 8.0.0
  • Remove selenium-standalone; update Selenium.WebDriver #51775
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Show user friendly error when network requests fail #51690
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Show user friendly message for streaming rendering failures #51687
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Rename Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing to Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestUtils #51713
    area-infrastructure
  • doc(DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement): Actual behaviour is different than class name #51490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Update HubConnection.ts to provide a easier to read order of SignalR params #51559
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
